summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3631 for the improvement of Brandon Street from 50th Avenue South to a point 170 feet east of 54th Avenue South, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44869, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
